column4: Validate CodeQL scan completes within 15 minutes
column5: CodeQL configured; Medium-sized repo (50K LOC)
column6: 1. Open PR with code changes; 2. Start timer when workflow begins; 3. Record completion time; 4. Calculate average across 10 PRs
column7: Average scan duration <15 minutes per PR

column4: Validate push protection responds within 2 seconds
column5: Push protection enabled; Developer workstation ready
column6: 1. Prepare commit with known secret; 2. Execute git push; 3. Time from push to rejection; 4. Record latency
column7: Push rejection occurs within 2 seconds

column4: Validate CodeQL handles repositories over 100K LOC
column5: Large test repository available; Extended timeout configured
column6: 1. Trigger full CodeQL scan on large repo; 2. Monitor resource usage; 3. Record completion time; 4. Verify all files analyzed
column7: Scan completes within 60 minutes with full coverage

column4: Validate system handles 10 concurrent CodeQL scans
column5: Multiple repos with CodeQL; GitHub-hosted runners
column6: 1. Trigger CodeQL on 10 repos simultaneously; 2. Monitor queue and execution; 3. Record completion times; 4. Check for failures
column7: All scans complete without throttling or failure

column4: Validate CodeQL recovers from transient failures
column5: CodeQL configured; Error injection capability
column6: 1. Simulate network timeout during scan; 2. Observe retry behavior; 3. Verify eventual completion; 4. Check alert accuracy
column7: Workflow retries and completes successfully

column4: Validate webhook retries on SIEM unavailability

column6: 1. Take SIEM offline; 2. Generate security alert; 3. Bring SIEM online; 4. Verify event delivered after retry
column7: Event delivered after SIEM restored

column4: Validate non-SSO login blocked for org members

column6: 1. Attempt password login to org; 2. Verify redirect to IdP; 3. Complete SSO login; 4. Verify org access

column7: Access blocked until MFA configured

column4: Validate API tokens have minimum required scope

column4: Validate all security events logged

column7: All security events logged with actor and timestamp

column4: Validate detected secrets not stored in GitHub

column7: Secret never persisted to repository storage

column7: Detection accuracy >=95% across all languages

column7: False positive rate <10% per SOW requirement

column4: Validate accuracy targets met per language
column5: Per-language test datasets prepared
column6: 1. Run accuracy test per language; 2. Calculate JS accuracy; 3. Calculate Python accuracy; 4. Calculate Java/C#/Go accuracy
column7: Each language achieves >95% detection accuracy
